data.title: Mary Ruth (Phillips) Neal Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Mary Ruth Neal, age 59 of Lake City, Tennessee passed away on Saturday, December 15, 2018 at her residence. Mary was born on August 29, 1959 in Lake City, Tennessee to the late...
data.text:
Mary Ruth Neal, age 59 of Lake City, Tennessee passed away on Saturday, December 15, 2018 at her residence. Mary was born on August 29, 1959 in Lake City, Tennessee to the late Amos and Ora Mae Perkins Phillips. Mary was a member of Fratersville Baptist Church. She enjoyed being a CNA, playing music, including all instruments, spending time with her family and friends, being outdoors, and hunting and fishing. In addition to her parents, Mary is preceded in death by her brother Jerry Phillips.

Survivors:

Husband Caleb Neal of Lake City

Sons Bradley Amos Curnutt of Lake City

Roger Everette Phillips of Lake City

Kevin Neal of Lake City

Robert Neal of Lake City

Billy Neal of Lake City

Brothers David Phillips& Betty of Clinton

A.R. Phillips of Lake City

Tommy Phillips & Viola of Lake City

Sisters Shirley Clowers of Lake City

Betty Kennedy of Lake City

Irene Harmon of Lake City

Imogene Wilson of Lake City

Pat Braden & Ray of Lake City

Grandchildren Destiny and Landon

Visitation: 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm, Monday, December 17, 2018 at Hatmaker Funeral Home in Lake City.

Funeral Service: 8:00 pm, Monday, December 17, 2018 at Hatmaker Funeral Home in Lake City with Rev. Danny Orick and Rev. Terry Sweat officiating.

Family and Friends will meet at Hatmaker Funeral Home on Tuesday, December 18, 2018 at 10:15 am to go in procession to Leach Cemetery in Lake City for an 11:00 am interment.
